doc:
/** * Returns the entry in the specified row and column. *

* Row and column indices start at 0 and must satisfy *

    *
  • 0 <= row < rowDimension
    • *
  • 0 <= column < columnDimension
    • *
* otherwise a MatrixIndexException is thrown.

* * @param row row location of entry to be fetched * @param column column location of entry to be fetched * @return matrix entry in row,column * @throws MatrixIndexException if the row or column index is not valid */
code: double getEntry(int row, int column) throws MatrixIndexException;
